page.description: The Sales_People form illustrates how you can have a Windows Bitmap (.BMP) or JPEG (.JPG) image field in a table, just as you would have a text or numeric field.

section.title: Putting an Image Field on a Form
section.description: The IMAGE field is a JPEG Image File Reference. It displays the contents of a JPEG (.JPG) image from the salespeople table. To create a similar field on a form, follow these steps:

step.description: Open a table with a JPEG Image File Reference field.
Display the form in the Form Editor.
Display the DragDrop List for the form by clicking the appropriate button on the toolbar.
Drag the image field onto the form.

section.title: Editing an Image Field on a Form
section.description: The operator can perform various insert, copy and delete operations after right-clicking on the image control.

step.description: Import (paste) a JPEG image from a file
Export (copy) the image to a file

section.title: Paste a JPEG image on the clipboard

step.description: Copy the image to the clipboard

section.note: The designer can also create a BMP Image File Reference field for .BMP (Windows Bitmap) images.
